{"id":802424389,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1663459992,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/802424389/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        vector<int>maxLeft(n, 0);\n        vector<int>maxRight(n, 0);\n        \n        maxLeft[0] = height[0], maxRight[n-1] = height[n-1];\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++){\n            maxLeft[i] = max(height[i], maxLeft[i-1]);\n            maxRight[n-i-1] = max(height[n-i-1], maxRight[n-i]);\n        }\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            int minMax = min(maxLeft[i], maxRight[i]);\n            ans += (minMax - height[i]);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
